name: Restaurant Recommendation System
desc: Developed a hybrid recommendation system using BERT and SVD on 2.5M+ Yelp reviews. Deployed with Streamlit for interactive user experience.

name: Dyslexia Detection from Eye Movements
desc: Built ML models (SVM, Random Forest) to classify dyslexia using eye-tracking data. Achieved 91% accuracy for early diagnosis.

name: Credit Risk Prediction
desc: Used XGBoost and Logistic Regression to predict loan default risk from 500K+ financial records. Visualized risk tiers in Power BI.

name: BlackGold Analytics
desc: Analyzed energy sector datasets to predict oil and gas production trends using time-series forecasting and regression models.

name: GASTech Operations Dashboard
desc: Analyzes operational data from GASTech Building to uncover patterns and improve energy efficiency using Python and Power BI.
